title: How does art affect people emotionally and psychologically? - Quora

response.answer_text: Art affects people emotionally by speaking to the heart, and knowing that you are not alone in feeling as you do is an effective psychological confidence-builder, as well. If you have six minutes to spare, watch this video of a flash-mob performance of Ode to Joy from Beethoven’s Ninth Symphony. Listen with your heart, and see for yourself what it does to those who listen with their hearts, too.
